ChatterMessage.name: ChatterMessage
ChatterMessage.description: Represents a message sent as part of a private conversation in Chatter.

ConversationId.description: ID of the conversation that the message is associated with.

SenderNetworkId.description: ID of the Experience Cloud site from which the message was sent. This field is available only if digital experiences is enabled in your org.This field is available in API version 32.0 and later.
